Topic.Title: Can I get some people to play test this?

Posts.EditableText:
Can I get some people to play test this? I just need some people to make sure the features work.
Link. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/xb0ge9kzbewhodrtmxnnqw/the-legend-of-the-secret-of-the-smelly-stinky-fish

Please make sure to equip a weapon (the fish) before doing anything.

Also, I know it says it's missing a parameter if you try attacking a monster without equipping a weapon. All you have to do is equip the weapon. I'll fix the problem later.
